Title: Pakistan-origin boy forced to confess IS allegiance in U.S.
Content: A 12-year-old Pakistani-American special needs student was forced by a school here to sign a false confession stating that he was part of the Islamic State (IS) and wanted to blow up the school fence
Author: PTI
Description: A 12-year-old Pakistani-American special needs student was forced by a school here to sign a false confession stating that he was part of the Islamic State (IS) and wanted to blow up the school fence
